177068.「おお <pc>か！\n 賢者エイドスの呼び出し ご苦労だったな。:
Oh, <pc>! Thank you again for
calling Eidos here.

177069.「……これで そろったな。\n では 謎の繭についての調査結果を\n 私から 皆:
Now that we are all here, I will share the
results of my investigation.

177070.「むむ？ アンルシアちゃんは どこじゃ？\n あの子が おらんと 始まらんではな:
Hmm? Where's Anlucia? We can't start without
her, can we?

177071.「勇者姫アンルシアと アリオス王には\n すでに 状況を 説明済みなのでな。\n:
I have already explained the situation to
Anlucia and the King. This meeting will be
conducted by only us here.

177072.「さて……グランゼドーラ城の 上空に\n 謎の巨大な繭が 出現したことは\n 皆:
Now... as you all know, a mysterious giant
cocoon has appeared in the sky above Gran
Zedora Castle.

177073.「我々は 調査隊を結成し\n あの繭についての情報を 集めてみたが\n 手がかり:
I formed an investigation team to gather
information on the cocoon. Unfortunately,
they found nothing.

177074.「グランゼドーラ王国をはじめ 諸国が所有する\n 古文書を 調べたが アストルテ:
I checked the archives of Gran Zedora, as well as the archives of all the other nations of Astoltia. There was no mention of this
cocoon in any historical record.

177075.「つまり あれは この世界にとって\n 未知なる存在である……と 言うしかない。:
Therefore, it is safe to assume we are
dealing with an entity from beyond Astoltia...

177076.「だが ここにいる 盟友 <pc>は\n あの繭を 見たことがあるそうだ。:
However, <pc> here is the only
one who has seen this entity before...

177077.「どういうことじゃ <pc>。\n 我らに 説明してくれ！:
What is the meaning of all this,
<pc>? Please explain what you know!

177078.<pc>は エテーネルキューブのチカラで\n時を渡って見た 荒廃した未来のアスト:
<pc> explained that by using the
Ethenel Cube, they were able to travel to a
future where Astoltia was destroyed!

177079.「大変でアール！ 大変でアール！\n <pc>が見た光景が 現実になるなら\n:
This is bad, this is bad! If what
<pc> saw comes true, the world will
be dooooomed!

177080.「繭……ということは\n あの中には 生き物が潜んでいると？:
A cocoon... does that mean there's something
alive inside of it?

177081.「……おそらくは。\n あれが 見た目どおり 繭なのだとしたら\n いずれは 外:
Most likely. If it is a cocoon, as it appears
to be, we must also assume whatever is inside
is preparing itself to come out.

177083.「大変です！ ルシェンダさま！\n ととと……とんでもないモノが 勇者の橋にっ！:
Lady Lushenda! T...there's been an incident
on the Bridge of Heroes!

177084.「ゆ 勇者の橋に……！\n 突然 怪物が 出現したのですっ！！:
A terrible monster has appeared on the
bridge...!!

177086.「はい……。勇者の橋の あたりの空が\n ふいに ぐにゃりと 歪んだと思ったら\:
Yes... the sky over the bridge suddenly became
distorted, and then a monster appeared out of
thin air!

177087.「見たこともない 不気味な怪物は\n し……城を目指し 移動をはじめました。:
I've never seen anything like it before.
It's... it's on the move to the castle!

177088.「万一の場合に そなえ\n 城下町へ通じる門は 閉ざしましたが\n このままでは:
We've closed the gates to the town just in
case, but at this rate, it will reach the
castle at any moment!

177089.「わかった！\n 自室にて 待機中の 勇者姫アンルシアにも\n 急ぎ 魔物出現の:
Understood! Please inform Anlucia of the
situation! She should be in her room right
now.

177090.「……聞いてのとおりだ <pc>。\n この城から 直接 橋へと向かい\n 出現:
<pc>, come with us. We're going to
go intercept the monster before it can reach
the castle!

177091.「油断するな <cs_pchero>！\n あやつ……ただものでは ないぞ！:
Be on your guard! I can't even begin to tell
what this thing is capable of!

177092.「あの魔獣を 城に 近づけるわけにはいかん！\n 皆の チカラを集めるのだ！:
That beast cannot be allowed to get near the
castle! We need to attack as one!

177095.「我ら 叡智の冠の結界……\n そうやすやすとは 破れぬぞ！:
We, the Crown of Wisdom, will not be beaten
so easily!

177096.「……どうやら アンルシアの到着を\n 待っているわけには いかんようだな。:
...Looks like we don't have the time to wait
for Anlucia to get here.

177097.「戦え <cs_pchero>！\n あの魔獣を 倒すのだ！！:
<cs_pchero>, hold the line until Anlucia
arrives!

177098.「我ら 叡智の冠が いるかぎり\n 貴様を 城へは 近づけんぞ！:
As long as we, the Crown of Wisdom, are here,
you will not come near the castle!

177100.「この結界が 破られぬうちに\n 今度こそ あの魔獣を 倒すのだ！:
We must defeat that beast this time,
before the barrier is broken!

177101.「叡智の冠と 盟友 <cs_pchero>に かかれば\n こんな魔獣など ひと:
With the Crown of Wisdom and <cs_pchero>'s
combined strength, there was nothing to
fear!

177103.「復活した……だと！？\n バカな！ 確かに <cs_pchero>が\n やつ:
It's alive!? How can this be!? We saw
<cs_pchero> defeat it!

177105.「さっすが アンルシアちゃん！\n 魔獣を 一刀両断とは かっこいいのぅ～！:
Atta' girl, Anlucia! Ya' sure do know how to
make an entrance, lassie!

177106.「……こいつが 突然 現れたという\n 魔獣なのね。<cs_pchero>。\n:
So this is that beast Lushenda told me
about? I wonder if it has something to do
with that creepy cocoon...

177108.「どうして……！？\n 完全に 倒したはずなのに！: How...!? I was sure I took it down!

177109.「まさか あの魔獣……不死身なのか！？\n このまま戦っても きりがないぞ。:
Don't tell me that this beast is...immortal?!
The fight will never end like this!

177110.「皆の衆！ やつを 封じるぞ！:
All right, everyone! Let's give it a taste
of our secret weapon!

177111.「我ら 叡智の冠が\n 四重の封空を ここに 創りださん！:
We, the Crown of Wisdom, call forth the
Quadraspace!

177112.「叡智の冠がひとり 賢者ブロッゲン！:
Speaking for Sage Broggen, of the Crown of
Wisdom!

177113.「叡智の冠がひとり 賢者ホーロー！: I am Sage Hollow, of the Crown of Wisdom!

177114.「叡智の冠がひとり 賢者エイドス！: I am Sage Eidos, of the Crown of Wisdom!

177115.「叡智の冠がひとり 賢者ルシェンダ！: I am Sage Lushenda, of the Crown of Wisdom!

177116.「我ら 叡智の冠の すべてが望む。: All that we, the Crown of Wisdom, desire.

177118.「四重の封空に 封印されたら\n いかなる魔物も 出られないのでアール！:
Once sealed in the Quadraspace, no monster can
hope to escape it!

177119.「やれやれ ひさしぶりに\n 高位の術を 使ったせいで 疲れたぞ。:
Oh dear... it's been a while since I've used
such advanced magic. I'm exhausted...

177120.「それにしても あの魔獣。\n 一瞬にして 復活するとは……。:
But still... I can't believe none of us
were able to defeat it...

177121.「まるで 伝説に聞く\n １０００年前の 魔王のようじゃな……。:
Such terrifying power hasn't been seen since
the Demon King that invaded 1000 years ago...

177122.「かつて 勇者アルヴァンが 倒したという\n 不死の魔王か……。:
The Immortal Demon King that was defeated by
the Hero Alvan...

177123.「あやつめ まさか……\n 四重の封空すらも 破るというのか！？:
Impossible... Don't tell me it's going to
break through even the Quadraspace?!

177124.「ならば 内側から 重ねて 封印するのじゃ！:
We're outta options! We're gonna have ta' seal
it from within!

177125.「アンルシアちゃん！ <cs_pchero>！\n わしら 叡智の冠は 四重の封:
You two! The Crown of Wisdom
will enter the Quadraspace and try to stop
that thing from getting out!

177126.「わしらが やつを封じている間に\n 不死のチカラに 打ち勝ち\n あやつを 倒:
We'll hold it back as long as we can! Ya
need to find a way to counter its
immortality and defeat it once and for all!

177127.「待ってください みなさん！\n 不死の魔獣を 倒す方法なんて どうやって……:
Wait, everyone! How are we supposed to defeat
something that's immortal...?

177128.「１０００年前……\n 勇者と 不死の魔王との 戦いに\n きっと……ヒント……:
1000 years ago, the Hero Alvan defeated the
Immortal Demon King. There must...be...a
hint...

177129.「……頼んだ…ぞ <cs_pchero>。\n アンルシア……:
<cs_pchero>... Anlucia... please...
We're... counting on you...

177131.「あの封印が 破られる前に\n 不死の魔獣を 倒す方法を 見つけなければ。\n:
We must find a way to defeat that immortal
beast before it breaks the seal! If we don't,
then Gran Zedora will...

177132.「……<cs_pchero>。\n さっき ルシェンダさまが １０００年前の\n:
...<cs_pchero>! Lushenda mentioned an
Immortal Demon King that lived 1000 years ago.

177133.「不死のチカラを持つ魔獣と 不死の魔王……\n 何か 関係があるのかしら？:
An immortal beast and an ancient Immortal
Demon King? Maybe there's a connection...?

177135.「……そうだわ！\n たしか 勇者の聖壇に １０００年前の勇者と\n 不死の魔王:
Oh, right! There's an inscription by the
Hero's Altar about the battle between the
Hero Alvan and the Immortal Demon King!

177136.「もしかしたら 不死の魔獣を倒す 手がかりが\n あるかもしれないわ……。城の１:
Maybe that's where we can find a clue about
the beast's immortality, and how we can
counter it! Let's meet at the altar, okay?

177137.「叡智の冠のみなさんが あの魔獣を\n 封印してくれている間に 急ぎましょう。\:
There's no time to waste!
We don't know how long the Crown of Wisdom
will be able to hold that thing back!

177138.「勇者の聖壇……。\n いつ来ても 気持ちが 引きしまるわ。:
The Hero's Altar...it's such a relaxing
place.

177139.「あなたも よく知っているとおり\n この勇者像は 私のご先祖さま。\n １００:
As you know, this is a statue of my ancestor.
He's the previous Hero that saved the world
1000 years ago.

177140.「昔……トーマ兄さまこそが 勇者なのだと\n 信じていた頃 私は 毎日のように\:
I used to say a prayer here for Toma every
day, back when we thought he was the Hero of
this age...

177141.「かつての勇者さま。どうか 私に\n トーマ兄さまを支える チカラをください……:
Hero of the past... please give me the
strength to support my brother Toma, so that I
may be a great ally!

177142.「……トーマ兄さまの 盟友になって\n ふたりで 世界を守るという\n かつての:
Unfortunately, my dream of protecting the
world at Toma's side would never come true...

177143.「今の私は あの頃とは ちがう。: I'm not the same as I was back then.

177144.「私の夢は 盟友である あなたとともに\n 兄さまの愛した アストルティアを守る:
Right now, my dream is to defend the Astoltia
that Toma loved with you as my ally,
<pc>.

177145.「この像のモデルになった\n 勇者アルヴァンさまにも 盟友が いたわ。: The Hero Alvan also had an ally...

177146.「勇者アルヴァンさまと 盟友カミル。\n 相手の幸せを お互いに 望みながらも\:
Her name was Kamil. She and Alvan crossed
paths, and the two of them decided to fight
together. They wanted each other to be happy.

177147.「ふたりが １０００年の時を経て\n 王家の迷宮で ようやく 再会できたことは\:
We saw them finally reunited after 1000 years
down in the Royal Maze.

177148.「けれど 勇者アルヴァンさまと 不死の魔王の\n 最後の戦いを目前にして……\n:
However, right before the final battle with
the Immortal Demon King, it's said that Kamil
ran away...

177149.「盟友に裏切られながらも 勇者アルヴァンさまは\n 命と引きかえに 不死の魔王を:
The Hero Alvan, despite being betrayed by his
ally, fought the Immortal Demon King alone.
He succeeded, but at the cost of his own life.

177150.「さっき 橋で戦った あの魔獣……\n 何度倒しても よみがえってくる その姿は:
The beast we fought back there... No matter how many times we beat it, it would just get right back up. Just like the Immortal Demon
King that Alvan had fought.

177151.「もし 勇者アルヴァンさまと\n 会うことができれば 不死の魔王を\n どうやっ:
If only we could speak with Alvan... We could
find out how he defeated an immortal being...

177153.「この場所には １０００年前とのつながりが\n あるっキュね。この 大きな像を:
This statue has a connection to the events
of 1000 years ago. We can use it to go back
in time, kyu.

177154.「あなた 誰なの！？\n <pc>。あなたのペット？:
Who is this?! Is this a pet of yours,
<pc>?

177155.「失礼なニンゲンっキュね～。\n キュルルは 誇り高き 時の妖精キュル。\n ペ:
How rude, kyu! I am Kyururu, proud time fairy!
If anyone is to be called a pet here,
that would be <pc>, kyu!

177156.「きゅる……る？\n それが この子の名前？: Kyuru... ru? Is that this thing's name?

177157.「<pc>。\n この像と さっきの魔獣は\n 似通った波動を 持っているようだ:
<pc>. This statue and that monster
from earlier have similar energy readings,
kyu.

177158.「つまり １０００年前へ 時間跳躍すれば\n 魔獣を倒す方法も 見つかる可能性が:
In other words, if we jump back in time to
1000 years ago, we might find some clues on
how to beat that monster, kyu!

177159.「１０００年前へ……時間を とぶ？\n 時を 渡って……\n 勇者アルヴァンさま:
Jump back...1000 years? So we can go back to
when Alvan was still alive...?

177161.「もし 本当に 過去へ跳べるのなら\n 私たち 一緒に １０００年前へ！\n ふ:
If you can really send us back in time, then
we should get going immediately. We might be
able to find a way to beat that beast!

177162.「それは 無理キュ。時渡りができるのは\n 時渡りのチカラを持つ エテーネの民だ:
That's impossible, kyu. Only the people of
Ethene have the power of time travel. You
won't be able to come with us, kyu.

177163.「そんな……！\n どうにかならないの <pc>！？:
No way... <pc>, isn't there
anything you can...

177165.「国王陛下が お呼びです。\n さきほどの怪物について 姫さまから\n 直接 お:
His Majesty the King wishes to see you. He
would like a full report on the situation
regarding the immortal beast!

177166.「……そうだったわ。賢者さまたちが いない今\n 私まで １０００年前に 旅立っ:
...I see. With the Sages gone, there will be
nobody left to protect Father and everyone
else in the castle if I go back in time.

177167.「<pc>。私は この時代に残ります。\n 不死の魔獣を倒す方法を 必ず 見つけ:
I will stay here and defend the castle if that
beast returns. Find a way to defeat it, and
please...come back safely.

177168.「行きましょう。\n お父さまは 玉座の間かしら？: Let's go. Is my father in the throne room?

177171.「それじゃ 時間跳躍を開始するキュ。 \n 時間設定…… １０００年前。:
I will begin the time leap, kyu. Time
setting: 1,000 years ago.

177172.「ポイント設定……グランゼドーラ王国。\n この勇者像と つながりのある場所に\:
Location setting: Gran Zedora. We should
arrive in a place that's connected to this
statue, kyu.

177173.「<pc>。\n １０００年前の勇者と 魔王との戦いの結末は\n 確定された歴史:
The events that transpired 1000 years
ago are a confirmed and well known
part of history, kyu.

177174.「すでに 起きてしまった歴史を 変えるのは\n 簡単なことでは ないキュ。\n:
Changing the past is no trifling matter, so
don't get any funny ideas while we're there,
kyu!

177175.「１０００年前で やるべきことは\n 不死の魔獣と いかにして戦うか……その方法:
All we have to do is observe, kyu. Once we
know how to defeat the immortal beast,
we can leave, kyu.

177176.「……設定完了。 \n エテーネルキューブ 起動キュ！:
Setting complete. I will now activate the
Ethenel Kyube, kyu!

177177.「ちょっと 座標がズレたみたいキュル。 \n まあ １０００年も 時間跳躍したん:
Looks like the kyube was a bit off again.
Still, we are within the margin of error and
are now 1000 years in the past, kyu.

177178.「さてと。現地人との接触は\n <pc>に まかせたキュ。\n ボクは しばらく:
I'll leave contacting the locals to you, kyu.
I'm going to rest for a while.

177179.「……この場所ならば 城の者たちに\n 聞かれる心配は ないでしょう。: ...We should be able to speak freely here.

177180.「カミル様……。\n 本当に 不死のチカラを 封じる秘術を\n 手に入れる おつ:
Lady Kamil...dost thou truly intend on seeking
out the sacred art of sealing immortality?

177181.「……私が 貴方に 内密の調査を\n 依頼したのは たわむれでは ありません。\:
I would not have made the request if I was
not certain, Yaslam.

177182.「……本来 秘術は 国をあげて探すべきもの。\n なにゆえ 勇者アルヴァン様にも:
...Yet I still do not understand. The entire nation should be searching for these arts. Why entrust such an important task to me, and
without informing Alvan?

177183.「……秘術のありかが たしかなものと\n なったなら アルヴァンにも 知らせまし:
Alvan will learn of the sealing arts once I am
certain of their whereabouts. Now is not the
right time to burden him with such a matter.

177184.「……いいえ！ 私の目は ごまかせませんよ。\n あなたは グランゼドーラのため:
Thine words cannot fool me, Kamil! Thine true
intentions are to sacrifice your own life to
save Gran Zedora!

177187.「私の気持ちは よく ご存知のはずです。\n ……そして この国が\n 長くは:
Thou knowest how I feel about thee, and thou
knowest as well as I that this country is not
long for this world.

177188.「長きにわたる 魔軍十二将との戦いで\n 国土は荒れ果て 生き残った民は わずか:
The Twelve Tyrants of the demon army have left the land in ruin, the survivors continue to dwindle in number... and the Demon King
shall soon burn the castle to the ground.

177189.「グランゼドーラは もう おしまいです。\n ……たとえ 勇者アルヴァン様であろ:
The end of Gran Zedora is upon us. Even the
Hero Alvan, with all his might, is no match
for the Immortal Demon King!

177190.「カミル様……グランゼドーラを捨てて\n 私と 逃げましょう。\n どうせ 我々:
Kamil, leave Gran Zedora with me! We should
not let our blood be spilled on this foreign
soil!

177192.「私と この国を出て……\n どこか遠いところで\n ふたりで 幸せに 暮らすの:
Let us leave this ruined land, Kamil. We
shall go far, far away, and live a life of
peace...

177194.「……私は グランゼドーラに命を救われた身。\n 我が身の犠牲で この国が救われ:
...I am indebted to Gran Zedora. Though it may
not be my land of birth, I would gladly give
my life for its salvation.

177195.「それに 国を出たところで\n 不死の魔王から 逃れるすべなど ありません。\n:
Even should we run from here, the armies of
the Demon King shall march on until all the
world is conquered. There is no escape...

177196.「あなたの気持ちが変わる その時を\n 私は……いつまでも 待っていますよ。\n:
I see... Shouldest thou ever change thy mind,
milady, know that I will be right here waiting
for thee.

177198.「……国から連れてきた従者に 調べさせたところ\n 秘術を祀ってある場所の 入り:
In regards to our prior topic, I sent my
scouts out, and we hath successfully located
the place in which the ancient arts rest.

177199.「古来より カギを守ってきた 守り人に\n 認められなければ 一国の王で あろう:
The guardian who holds the key to those arts tests the resolve of all who wish to enter. None have ever succeeded, be they
king or commoner.

177200.「すぐに その者に 会いにいきます。\n どこにいるのです？ 教えてください！:
Then I shall be the first! Where is it? Tell
me!

177203.「見張り塔より 伝令です！\n 魔王軍が 城下町へ接近しています。\n みなさん:
A message from the watchtower! The Demon
King's army is approaching the town.
Everyone! Evacuate to the castle immediately!

177204.「話は あとで ゆっくり聞かせてもらいます。\n 魔物たちは 私にまかせてくださ:
We shall speak more of this later. Leave the
demons to me, thou must go back to the castle
and protect Princess Vistaria!

177205.「あんた 早く 逃げろっ！\n そいつは 魔軍十二将 猛将ギーグハンマーだ！\n:
You, get out of here! That's Tyrant
Clubber! Thou art no match for him!

177207.「愚かにして 貧弱なる 人間どもよ！\n 我が主 不死の魔王様のために\n 貴様:
Foolish, meager humans! For the sake of my
lord, the Immortal Demon King, I offer up
what remains of thine souls!

177208.「貴様……何者だ？\n いまだ これほどの使い手が\n この国に 生き残っていた:
Who art thou!? There should be none left alive
in this town with the power to stand against
me!

177209.「強き者よ！ 勝利の祝いだ！\n 我が軍勢との戦いも 存分に 楽しむがよい！\n:
Celebrate thine victory, mighty one! Feast
upon mine army to thy heart's content!
Gwohohohoho... Gurk...!

177210.「……じきに 我が主 不死の魔王様は\n グランゼドーラに総攻撃を仕掛ける ご予:
Soon my lord, the Immortal Demon King, plans
to launch his final assault on Gran Zedora.
Thine petty victory is but a mere setback...

177211.「あがくだけ ムダなことよ……\n 不死なる…我が主……\n ……いずれ……俺も:
The immortality of my lord extends to the
faithful. Be warned. Soon I... shall...
return...

177213.「あの ギーグハンマーを\n まさか 倒してしまうとは……。: I never thought I'd see the day...

177219.「……魔軍十二将め。\n 城下町を 破壊しつくすつもりか！？:
The Twelve Tyrants grow bolder. This was an
attempt to destroy the entire town!

177220.「やはり 一刻も早く\n 不死の魔王を倒さなければ……うっ！:
All the more reason to defeat the Demon King
as soon as... ugh!

177221.「魔王城で負ったキズが 開いたのですね。\n すぐに 城へ戻って 手当てを！:
Let us return to the castle. I fear thine
wounds may have opened up amidst all the
chaos.

177222.「大げさだなあ カミルは。\n このぐらい どうってことは ないさ。\n それよ:
Please, Kamil. 'Tis but a scratch. We have
more important things to worry about.

177223.「そこにいる ギーグハンマーを倒した英雄を\n 城へ 招待したいんだ。:
You there, champion! I'd likest thou to return
to the castle with us so that we may thank
thee.

177225.「ギーグハンマーは 私たち ふたりがかりでも\n 手こずるほどの相手です。\n:
Giga Clubber was a formidable opponent, even
for us. Please, won't thou tell us thine name?

177226.「……<cs_pchero>さんと おっしゃるのですね。\n あなたのような 頼:
<cs_pchero>... 'Tis reassuring to have
someone as dependable as thee around here in
these trying times.

177227.「ああ！ <cs_pchero>が グランゼドーラに\n 来てくれたのは まさに:
Ah! The gods truly favor us if they send one such as thee to our aid. I would like to introduce thee to my father, the king.
Wouldest that be acceptable?

177228.「そう つれないことを 言わないでくれ。\n 君という 頼もしい味方を\n 父王:
Don't be so modest, champion! My father would
love to meet someone as strong and capable
as thee!<yesno><close>

177230.「はじめて会ったのに おかしいけれど\n 君のことは 他人という気が しないんだ:
'Tis strange. Though we have not met before,
thou doth not feel like a stranger, either.

177231.「まるで 旧知の……\n 頼もしい友人のように 感じるんだよ。:
'Tis as though thou wert an old acquaintance,
or a trusted friend.

177232.「では 我々は お先に 失礼するよ。\n 衛兵には 話をつけておくから\n 玉座:
Please excuse us. I shall explain the
situation to the guards. Please meet us at the
throne room as soon as thou art able!

177233.「……なるほど。城下町に 襲撃してきた魔物を\n 旅の者が 倒してくれたというの:
...I see. A traveler aided in the demon army's
defeat?

177234.「はい。魔軍十二将が 一角\n 猛将ギーグハンマーは ひときわ 凶暴な魔物。\n:
Yes. Of the Twelve Tyrants, few are as
formidable as Clubber. Even Kamil and I
had issues fighting him in the past.

177236.「うわさをすれば なんとやら だな！\n ちょうど 君の話をしていたところだ。:
And here's the guest of honor. We were
just talking about thee.

177237.「紹介しよう。我が父 ジュテ国王。\n 僕の 剣の師匠でもあるんだよ。\n とな:
Let me introduce thee to my father, King Jute. He is also my swordfighting teacher. Beside him are my mother, Emelia, and my sister,
Felina.

177238.「こちらは <pc>。\n ギーグハンマーを倒した 英雄で\n 異国から来た と:
This is <pc>, the champion who
defeated Giga Clubber. They art a very skilled
fighter from a far-off land.

177240.「私とも 仲良くしてくださいね <pc>。\n アルヴァン兄様が 最近 構ってく:
I hope thou wilt be good friends with me too, . I've been feeling a bit bored because Alvan hasn't been giving me much
attention lately.

177241.「不死の魔王を 倒し 世界が平和になったら\n いくらでも 遊んでやるとも！\n:
When the Immortal Demon King is defeated and the world is at peace, I will play with thee as long as thou likest! Until then, wait for
me, Felina.

177242.「して……魔王城は いかがであった？\n アルヴァンよ。:
So... what happened at the Demon King's
castle, Alvan?

177244.「はい……我が国の南 海上に浮かぶ 魔王城には\n 無数の魔物たちが ひしめき\:
Yes... the Demon King's castle, floating on the sea south of our country, was crowded with countless monsters, preparing for the coming
invasion.

177246.「アルヴァンは ペガサスで。\n 私は 飛竜にて 空から偵察していたところ\n:
Alvan was on Pegasus, while I was on my flying
dragon. The monsters noticed us, and we had no
choice but to fight...

177248.「魔軍十二将を蹴散らし 不死の魔王にも 一度は\n 深手を負わせたものの……やつ:
We fought a few of the Tyrants, and even managed to wound the Demon King himself, though he healed almost instantly. We had no
choice but to retreat.

177250.「やつの 不死のチカラを 封じぬかぎり\n 僕たちに 勝機はありません。:
Unless we find a way to seal his immortality,
there is no chance of victory.

177251.「いずれ 倒した 魔軍十二将たちも\n 魔王の持つ 不死のチカラで よみがえり\:
The Twelve Tyrants will eventually be revived
by the Demon King's immortal power, and the
battle will continue until naught remains...

177252.「たった ふたりだけで 魔王と戦った……？\n なんという無茶をするのじゃ アル:
The two of you fought the Demon King alone!?
How reckless! Is that where those wounds came
from?

177253.「はい……。不死の魔王から 私めを かばい\n アルヴァンは ひどいケガを……:
Yes... Alvan was badly injured protecting me
from the Immortal Demon King.

177254.「役立たずの盟友が 足をひっぱったから\n 魔王ネロドスを 倒せなかったのね！:
Alvan was injured because his useless ally
dragged him down. The Demon King would be
dead otherwise!

177255.「……ヴィスタリア姫の おっしゃるとおりです。\n 勇者を守るべき 盟友の役目を:
Thou art correct, Princess Vistaria. 'Tis my
duty as ally to defend the Hero, yet he was
injured while trying to protect me...

177256.「いや カミルは 魔軍十二将\n 邪将トロルバッコスに 食われそうになった時\n:
No, Kamil saved my life when I was about to be
eaten by Tyrant Gladiator Troll. She saved my
life.

177257.「でも……そんな おケガを なさっていては\n 魔王を相手に 戦うことはできませ:
That changes nothing. Thou art in no condition
to fight the Demon King with an injury like
that. If only Kamil...

177258.「僕の身体のことは 僕が 一番わかっています。\n ご心配には およびませんよ。:
I thank thee for thine concern, my dear bride. Though thou needn't worry. I know my body best, and it shall take more than a mere
scratch to stop me.

177259.「ヴィスタリア姫 ご安心くださいませ。\n ……もう 勇者様に ご迷惑はかけませ:
Princess Vistaria, rest assured, I will not
trouble Alvan any longer. Alvan, please, get
some rest.

177260.「私は やるべきことが ありますので\n お先に 失礼いたします。:
I have something to do, so if you'll excuse
me.

177261.「くぅ～っ！ 去りゆく背中の りりしさよ！\n 盟友カミルは じつに わしの創作:
Such a noble soul, that Kamil! I can feel my
creativity flowing after witnessing such a
scene!

177262.「あーら。どこへ行くのかしら？\n アルヴァンさまと グランゼドーラを見捨てて\:
Where dost thou think thou art going, Kamil?
Dost thou intend to abandon my dearest Alvan
and flee Gran Zedora in fear?

177263.「し……失礼ながら ヴィスタリア様。\n カミル様は おそらく 不死のチカラを封:
Lady Vistaria, with all due respect, I believe
Kamil is searching for a method to seal away
the Demon King's immortality.

177264.「不死のチカラを 封じる術……？: A way to seal the power of immortality...?

177265.「伝承に聞く 禁忌の秘術……\n 不死のチカラを封じる 秘術のありかを\n まさ:
So Kamil hath found something that may lead
us to victory against the Immortal Demon King!

177266.「盟友カミルの言葉に 偽りは ありますまい。\n 必ずや 禁忌の秘術とやらを 手:
Kamil is an honorable woman. She will return
to us, sealing arts in hand!

177267.「ああ。不死のチカラさえ 封じることができれば\n 僕たちが 負けるはずはない！:
Yes! Once the Demon King's immortality has
left him, nothing shall stand between us and
victory!

177268.「カミル……が 帰ったら……\n すぐ……魔王城へ……くっ。:
When Kamil returns... we march for... the
Demon King's castle... kgh!

177270.「……心配ないよ フェリナ。\n ちょっと ふらついた だけ……さ。:
Don't worry, Felina. I just felt a bit
light-headed... that's all.

177271.「わしの目は ごまかせぬぞ。\n 魔王城で負ったケガは かすりキズとは\n いか:
Do not try and deceive me, Alvan. Those
injuries thou hath sustained are more than
just "mere scratches".

177272.「衛兵！ 我が息子を 部屋へ連れていけ！\n アルヴァン。秘術探しは カミルにま:
Guards, escort Alvan to his room. Thou shalt
get some rest until Kamil returns from her
quest.

177273.「……では 皆の者。\n 本日は これにて 解散とする！: Everyone, court is dismissed for today!

177275.「そなたに ひとつ頼みがある。\n 盟友カミルを追い 不死のチカラを封じる\n:
I have a favor to ask of thee. Find Kamil and
aid her in her quest to obtain the ancient
sealing arts.

177276.「我が息子 アルヴァンは 勇者であると同時に\n グランゼドーラの 王位継承者で:
My son may be the Hero of this age, but he is
also heir to the throne of Gran Zedora. I
cannot allow him to die.

177277.「だが 不死のチカラを封じる秘術なくしては\n 世界は 滅びてしまうじゃろう。\:
Without a way to seal the Demon King's
immortality, the war is lost and the world
shall perish. Hence why I ask for thy aid.

177278.「むろん ほうびは はずもう。 \n カミルを助け 禁忌の秘術を手に入れてくれ！:
I shall have a suitable reward prepared for
thee. Please, find Kamil and ensure she
obtains the sealing arts!<yesno><close>

177279.「これは 世界の存亡に 関わることなのじゃ。\n <pc>よ。\n カミルを 追:
The survival of the world hangs in the
balance. <pc>, please lend thy aid
to Kamil! Thou must!<yesno><close>

177280.「……うむ！\n では 頼んだぞ <pc>よ。:
...Mm! Well then, I am counting on thee,
<pc>.

177281.「カミルの行方は わからぬが\n さきほどの様子では ヴィスタリア姫の従者\n:
I do not know where it is Kamil went, though.
Princess Vistaria's retainer, Yaslam, might
know more about it.

177282.「どうか カミルの行方を つきとめ\n 秘術探しを 手伝ってやってくれ。\n …:
Please track down Kamil and help her find the
secret arts. I am counting on thee,
<pc>.

177283.「……みつけた！\n ここが 神儀の護堂……\n 不死のチカラを封じる秘術を 祀:
...I've found it! So this is the Guardian's
Hall, where the ancient arts of sealing
immortality are hidden...

177285.<pc>は 盟友カミルに\n国王に頼まれ 秘術探しを手伝いに来たことを\n伝えた:
<pc> tells Kamil about the king's
request.

177286.「お気持ちは 大変 うれしいのですが……\n アルヴァンは負傷しています。\n:
I appreciate thine concern, but Alvan is
wounded. I'm afraid he can't protect the
castle by himself.

177287.「<pc>さん。\n 私を 手伝ってくださる気持ちが あるのなら\n 城へ戻り:
If thou truly wish to aid me, thou shouldest
return to the castle and prepare for the next
attack.

177288.「そうしてくれれば 私も 安心して\n 不死のチカラを封じる秘術を 探せます。\:
Shouldest thou do this, then I shall be able
to search for the sealing arts with peace of
mind.

177289.「あの馬車は グランゼドーラ王家の……？:
That wagon... 'tis the Gran Zedora royal
family's...

177291.「ヴィスタリア姫……！？\n どうして このような 危険なところに。:
Princess Vistaria...! What bringeth thee to
such a dangerous place?

177292.「ふーん。この扉 見せかけだけじゃないわね。\n 奥に 広いお部屋が ありそうだ:
Hmm. This door isn't just for show. There
appears to be a large room behind it.

177293.「てっきり 魔王軍に恐れをなして\n ひとりで逃げる気だと 思ってたけど\n あ:
I thought thou had intended to flee Gran Zedora like the coward thou art, but 'twould seem thou truly art searching for the sealing
arts.

177294.「ま……いいわ。あなたなんかに 手柄を\n 立てさせてたまるもんですか！\n 秘:
I shan't allow for the likes of thee to take
credit for this. It shall be me who delivers
the sealing arts to my beloved Alvan!

177295.「姫！ 何をおっしゃるのです。\n 遺跡には 危険な魔物も 出ましょう。\n ど:
Princess! There are dangerous monsters in the
ruins beyond. Please return to the safety of
the castle.

177297.「ほらぁ！ さっさと 扉を 開けなさい！\n この遺跡の扉は 勇者か盟友でないと:
Come now, open the door! Only a Hero or ally
has the power to open the door. Right, Yaslam?

177298.「あ…あなた様は 未来の王妃なのですよ？\n もしものことでも あったら\n ア:
M-milady, you are the future queen. If
something were to happen to thee, Alvan would
be devastated!

177299.「……なら 未来の王妃の 命令よ。\n カミル。すぐに この扉を 開けなさぁい！:
Your future queen hath spoken, Kamil. Open
this door at once!

177301.「<pc>さん……。\n さきほどの言葉は 撤回いたします。\n どうか 遺跡の:
<pc>... I take back what I said
before. Please join me as we venture into the
ruins.

177302.「……あなたには ぜひとも\n おふたりの護衛を お願いいたしたい。\n どうか:
With Princess Vistaria here, I would like to
ask for thy assistance in keeping her safe.

177303.「あら。あなたが わたくしの護衛なの？\n それじゃ さっさと 行きましょ！\n:
Oh? Art thou to be my escort on this journey?
Surely thou shalt be more reliable than Kamil.
Let's get going, <pc>!

177304.「……ご迷惑を おかけいたしますが\n どうぞ よろしくお願いいたします。\n:
...I apologize for any inconvenience this may
cause and thank thee in advance for thine
patience, <pc>.

177305.「では……\n シュトルケ殿から 教わった方法にて\n この扉を 開くことに い:
Very well. I shall open this door just as
Captain Stolke taught me.

177306.「我 当代の盟友カミルが\n 大いなる遺跡の守護者に 乞い願う……:
I, Kamil, ally of our time, beseech the great
ruin guardian!

177307.「秘術へ至る道 その扉を\n ここに 開かんことを……アバカム！:
May the path to the ancient arts be revealed!
Abakam!

177308.「……それでは 私は 先に入って\n 様子を 見てまいります。\n ヴィスタリア: Allow me to lead the way, Princess Vistaria.

177309.「お……お待ちなさい カミル！\n ヤスラム！ 後を追うわよ！:
W-wait! <pc>, Yaslam, we're going
in too!

177311.「立ち止まっていては 危険です！\n いつ 魔物が 襲ってくるともしれぬのですよ:
I understand thou art tired, milady, but I ask
that thou bear with it a little longer. If we
stop, we open ourselves up to an ambush.

177312.「イヤったら イ・ヤ！\n もう わたくし 歩けないもの。\n ヤスラム。座りた:
No, no, no, no! I can't walk anymore. Yaslam.
I want to sit down!

177313.「……ここで ご休憩なさるそうです。\n 私は こちらを 見張りますので\n <:
It appears we have no choice. I will keep
watch over here. <pc>, take that
side.

177314.「ああ 足が痛いこと……。\n それもこれも みーんな カミルが悪いのよ。\n:
My feet hurt... everything is always thine
fault, Kamil! 'Tis because thou brought me to
such a horrible place.

177316.「そうやって しおらしいフリをしたって\n だまされないわよ。:
Don't think thou canst fool me by acting
polite, you wretch!

177317.「あなたは……\n わたくしの兄様を 殺したんだから！: Thou art the fiend that killed my brother!

177318.「どうして アルヴァンさまは お父様に\n カミルなんかの 命ごいをしたのかしら:
Wherefore did Alvan ask for mercy for thee? He
is far too kind...

177319.「お…お言葉を返すようですが ヴィスタリア様。\n アルヴァン様によれば\n あ:
With all due respect, milady, even Lord Alvan
himself says 'twas an unfortunate accident...

177320.「いえ……ヤスラム殿。\n 姫の おっしゃるとおりです。\n あの時のことは よ:
No, Yaslam. The princess is right. I remember
that day well.

177321.「オルセコ王国で 開催された 武術大会にて\n ファルエンデ国代表として ご出場:
'Twas at a martial arts tournament held in the Orseco Kingdom. I had a heated battle with Princess Vistaria's brother, who was
representing the Kingdom of Farende.

177322.「ファルエンデ国 次期国王だった\n わたくしの兄様を あなたが 殺した。\n:
Then thou slaughtered him... the future king
of Farende. My poor father watched it all
happen from the guest of honor's seat.

177323.「怒った お父様に 首をはねられる寸前\n たまたま ご観覧なさっていた\n ア:
Father was furious, but just as he was about
to take thine head, Alvan approached him and
begged for thine life.

177324.「……慈悲深き ファルエンデ国 国王陛下により\n 私の生命は アルヴァン預かり:
By the mercy of His Majesty the King of
Farende, my life is in the custody of Alvan,
and I live on.

177326.「……わたくしの 兄様は\n あなたに 殺されたのにね。大罪人カミル。:
The same cannot be said for my brother,
murdered by the great sinner Kamil.

177328.「……すこし 乱暴なところも あったけれど\n わたくしには とても 優しい 兄:
He was tough, and a bit of a ruffian, but we
were always there for each other. 'Twas just
the two of us...

177329.「それを…あなたが……！: Then thou tookest him away from me...!

177330.「どう 言い訳をしようとも\n 私が人殺しであることに 違いはございません。:
I do not disagree, milady. I am a murderer, no
matter how I try to explain myself.

177331.「ですから その償いとして……\n 生命にかえても 勇者アルヴァンの盾となり\n:
That is why, as atonement for my sins, I shall be the shield that defends Alvan. Even should it cost me my life, I shall protect him from
all harm.

177332.「……な なによっ えらそうに！\n 先日 魔王城に偵察に行ったときだって\n:
Surely thou jest! How dare thou calleth
thyself Alvan's shield while he lies injured
in Gran Zedora Castle!

177333.「ヴィスタリア姫。どうか 信じてくださいませ。\n 私は 心より この世界を 救:
And I offer no excuses for my failures! But believe me, Princess, I want nothing more than to save this world. I shall obtain the sealing
arts and defeat the Demon King!

177334.「汚れた手の 私ごときにできる 恩返しは\n それだけ なのですから……。:
'Tis the least my blood-stained hands can do
to atone for all I've done...

177336.「……姫。これからも 未来の王妃として\n アルヴァンを 支えてさしあげてくださ:
Princess. Please continue to support Alvan as
the future queen. I beg thee.

177337.「……そろそろ 出発いたしましょう。\n すべては もうすぐ終わるはずです。:
...Let us continue. We have almost reached
the end.

177339.「<pc>さん！\n あなたも 急いでください！ カミル様は……:
<pc>, thou shouldst follow them. I
worry for Lady Kamil...

177340.「おそらく……死ぬつもりです。: I fear... that she might die.

177341.<center>見事だ……盟友カミルよ\nよくぞ 秘術の守護者たる 我を 倒した:
Well fought, Ally Kamil. Thou hast proven
thine determination and resolve. I, the Arcane
Guardian, declare thee worthy.

177342.<center>よかろう……この巻物に記されし\nふたつの 対なる秘術を そなた:
I shall bestow upon thee the ancient sealing
arts.

177343.<center>まず ひとつめの秘術は 邪魂の鎖……:
The first of the secret arts is that of the
wicked chains of binding...

177345.<center>邪魂の鎖にて 縛れば\nいかに 不死のチカラといえども\n逃れよ:
These chains shall bind the terrible power of
the Demon King. Seal his power, and victory
shall be within reach.

177346.<center>されど 気をつけよ……\n邪魂の鎖は 術者の魂より 生み出される:
But be warned, the chains shall be forged from
thine very soul.

177347.<center>鎖の輪を ひとつ生み出すたび\n魂はけがれ 死の苦しみが 汝を襲:
With each link formed, thine soul shall become
more and more corrupted. Death is all but
certain if thou intend to bind the Demon King.

177348.「不死のチカラを 封じる秘術など\n 絶対に 使わせない！:
Enough! I will not allow for thee to seal my
master's immortality!

177349.<center>盟…友……よ……\n秘術……そなた…託し…た……:
Ally... I entrust you... with the...
secret arts...

177350.「カミル様……あなたに その秘術を\n 使わせるわけには いきません……。:
Kamil, I apologize, but I cannot allow thee to
leave here with the sealing arts...

177351.「突然 何を なさるのです！\n ヤスラム殿……:
Yaslam, hast thou gone mad!? What is the

177353.「ち…ちょっと ヤスラム！？\n あなた……どうして 笑っているの……？:
Yaslam...? Wherefore art thou laughing so

177354.「あーっはっはっはっは！\n ヤスラムだと！？ そんな 下賤な名前で\n 私を:
Ah-ha-ha! Yaslam!? ! I wish thou wouldst not

177356.「ヤスラム！\n 貴様 魔物だったのか！？: Yaslam! Thou wert a monster this whole time!?

177358.「誉れ高き 我が まことの名は！\n 魔軍十二将が ひとり 知将ジャミラス！！:
I shall honor thee with my true name. I am
Tyrant Jamirus, chief strategist of the Twelve
Tyrants!

177359.「下等にして醜い 人間の女よ！\n 貴様に 恋い焦がれていた ヤスラムとは\n:
Lowly, hideous woman! Thou longed for Yaslam,
but 'twas me the whole time!

177360.「魔軍十二将が いったい いつの間に\n グランゼドーラ城に 入り込んでいたので:
How could this have happened!? How long hast
thou been undercover in Gran Zedora!?

177361.「この マヌケな姫様が ファルエンデ国から\n やってきた その晩からさぁ！\n:
Since the night this idiot princess arrived

177362.「ジャミラス！ 姫に かすりキズひとつでも\n つけたら 承知せぬぞ！！:
Hear me, Jamirus! If thou so much as scratch

177363.「そ・れ・はぁ～。\n あなたの 態度次第ですねえ。カミル様。:
Is that so, Lady Kamil? I would watch thine

177364.「では ３つほど お願いを\n 聞いていただきましょうか。:
Now, I shall make three requests, and thou

177365.「……どうしましたぁ？ 大事な大事な\n 未来の グランゼドーラ王妃様の 生命が:
Oh? Why dost thou hesitate? Perhaps thou does
not wish to save the future queen of Gran
Zedora. She was so cruel to thee, after all.

177366.「言うとおりに しよう。\n だから ヴィスタリア姫を 解放してくれ。:
I will do as thou sayeth. So let Princess
Vistaria go.

177367.「よろしい。では ふたつめ。\n いまいましい 秘術の巻物を こちらへ。:
Second: Thou shalt hand over the sealing arts
to me.

177369.「はっはぁ！ 素直な女は 好きですよ。\n では……次が 最後のお願いです。:
Ha-ha! Oh, how I love a woman who is obedient.
Now, my final request...

177370.「愚かなる盟友 カミル様！\n <cs_pchero>と ともに\n どうか こ:
Foolish Kamil. <pc>. Please stand
still as I kill the both of thee!

177373.「乱暴は や…やめて！\n わたくしを 離して……: No... no more violence! Let me go...

177374.「さんざん 見せつけたおかげで\n 世話係ヤスラムと 盟友カミルが 恋仲だという:
Ha-ha-ha! Hast thou heard the rumors, Lady
Kamil? They say that Yaslam and thee are madly
in love!

177375.「ここで あなたを消し 私が姿を隠せば\n 盟友カミルは 魔王との決戦を前に 恋:
If thou wert to disappear, the people of Gran Zedora will believe thou fled with thine true love before the final battle, abandoning poor
Alvan to his fate!

177376.「あーっはっはっは！\n なんと 愚かで けがらわしき盟友！\n よかったですね:
Ha-ha-ha! What a coward thou art! Now, as for
my dear Princess...

177377.「兄上を殺した人殺しの 名誉が地に堕ち！\n カミルが 目の前から消える！\n:
I shall honor thy brother by destroying the
villainous Kamil right before thy eyes! Just
as thou wished for!

177379.「いかがです 姫様ぁ～？\n この 人殺しの盟友めが 無様に死ぬ姿！\n お楽し:
Art thou satisfied, your highness? To see the
one that took thy dear brother from thee in
such agony?

177380.「も…もう やめて！！\n もう 充分ですっ！ だから やめて……:
Stop... stop it! That's enough! I've had
enough!

177381.「心配……ありませんよ 姫……。\n 私は 並の人間より じょうぶに出来ています:
Do not... worry about me, Princess. It shall

177382.「ほほう？ まだ そんなに しゃべれるとは。\n ならば もっと念入りに\n い:
Oh-ho? Such bold words. Very well, I will
hold back no longer!

177385.「この 小娘がぁ！\n お前も いたぶってほしいらしいな！？:
Little wench! I shall gladly kill thee as
well!

177386.「盟友カミル！ <cs_pchero>！\n み……未来の グランゼドーラ王妃の:
Ally Kamil! <cs_pchero>! By order of the
future queen of Gran Zedora!

177387.「わたくしは どうなっても かまわないわ。\n ヤスラムを……\n この魔物を:
I don't care what happens to me. Defeat
Yaslam... no, destroy this monster!

177390.「ふん……死に損ないめが！: Hmph, so thou yet live as well...

177391.「よかろう！ 思い上がった盟友よ！\n この 知将ジャミラスが\n じきじきに:
Very well! I, Tyrant Jamirus, shall
strike thee down in honor of my lord!

177392.「<cs_pchero>さんっ！\n 今度こそ ジャミラスを 倒しましょう！:
<cs_pchero>! This time we will defeat
Jamirus!

177393.「よかろう！ 思い上がった人間どもよ！\n この 知将ジャミラスが\n じきじき:
Very well! Arrogant humans! Jamirus
will soon have thee dead to rights!

177394.「……まあいい。こたびは 貴様らの 勝ちだ。\n だが 不死のチカラを封じる秘術:
Victory... is thine. However, I shall not...
allow those sealing arts... to be used against
my master!

177395.「ジャミラス……何をするつもりです！？: Jamirus! What art thou scheming now?

177396.「もはや 外へ出ることは かなうまい！\n 人間どもよ！ 秘術を抱いて朽ち果てる:
This ancient hall shall be thine tombs! Thou
shalt rot here for all eternity, whilst my
lord reduces thine world to ash! Ha-ha-ha...!

177397.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n どうやら 我々は この遺跡の中に\n 閉:
...<cs_pchero>. 'Twould appear we are
trapped inside these ruins.

177398.「この大岩を どうにか どかせれば……:
If we could just get this big rock out of the
way...

177400.「申し訳ありません……。\n さきほどのケガが 響いているようです。\n まった:
I apologize. 'Twould seem my wounds are worse
than I hath thought. 'Tis a shameful thing.

177404.「……わたくし あなたのことは キライよ。: ...Do not think I have forgiven thee, Kamil.

177405.「<cs_pchero> 盟友カミル。\n あなたがたは わたくしの 命の恩人で:
<pc>, Kamil. I thank thee both for
saving my life.

177406.「ヴィスタリア姫。現在 我々は この遺跡の中に\n 閉じ込められてしまいました。:
Princess Vistaria, we are currently trapped
inside these ruins. Please rest while we
search for a way out.

177408.「今は なんとも……。\n 最善は尽くしますゆえ 私を信じてください。:
I cannot say for certain... but please, know

of here.

177412.「どうして こんなところに 猫が……？: Why is there a cat here...?

177413.「あの子ぐらい 身体が小さければ\n 外へ出ることも できたのに……。:
If only we were as small as she is, we could
get out...

177415.「さっきの ヨロイの幽霊さんの話……。\n 秘術を使うと 魂が けがれてしまうっ:
What was the guardian saying earlier... about
the sealing arts "corrupting thine soul"?

177416.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n そちら側に 脱出できそうな隙間は\n あ:
...<pc>, didst thou notice any
gaps on the other side through which we can
escape?

177417.「わ…わたくし 知ってるのよ！\n 国で 家庭教師に 教わったもの！:
Thou cannot fool me, Kamil! I was educated by
the very best tutors of Farende!

177418.「大きなことを成しとげる 秘術の中には\n 使い手の生命を 奪うものも あるんだ:
I was taught of certain magical techniques. Ones that could accomplish great things, but cost the users their very lives. Is that what
thou intendeth to do?

177419.「姫様。あまり おしゃべりを されますと\n おケガに さわります。\n どうか:
Princess, please remain silent. I would not
want thee to tire thyself out by speaking too
much...

177420.「世界を救うために 死ぬ気なの！？\n だって 死んじゃったら 世界は平和になっ:
Thou intendeth to die to save the world! I do
not understand. The world may find peace, but
thou wouldst be...

177421.「この 大岩さえ どかすことができれば\n 脱出できる可能性も ありますが\n:
If we could get rid of this big rock, we might
be able to escape, but there's nothing we can
do about it now...

177422.「この秘術で 不死のチカラを 封じさえすれば\n アルヴァンならば 絶対に\n:
If only I could use the sealing arts from
here. Alvan would surely be able to defeat
the Immortal Demon King...

177423.「ここで 死ぬわけにはいかない……。\n ウデの１本や２本 くれてやる！\n ア:
No... I shall not die in this place! One way

177424.「あなた……\n アルヴァンさまのこと 愛してるのね？: Thou... thou loveth Alvan, dost thou not?

177426.「勇者とともに 不死の魔王を倒すこと。\n ……それは 盟友としての 私の悲願で:

towards Lord Alvan.

177427.「うそよっ！\n わたくしには わかります！\n あなた……カミルは アルヴァン:
Lies! I can see thine true feelings, Kamil!

177428.「今の声は……！\n カミル！ ここに 閉じ込められているのか！？:
That voice...! Kamil! Art thou trapped in

177433.「カミルのことが 気がかりで 城を抜け出して\n 探しにきたんだよ。そうしたら:
I was worried about thee, so I snuck out of

177434.「何かを 訴えるように\n 必死に鳴くので ついて来てみたら……\n ここに 着:
The little creature was in quite the panic,

177435.「あの猫……もしかしたら\n 神の使いだったのかも しれないな……。: Mayhaps 'twas a messenger from the heavens...

177436.「……そうでしたか。\n ここは 神儀の護堂……不死のチカラを\n 封じる秘術が:
...So that is what happened. This is the

177437.「<cs_pchero>と ヴィスタリア姫様の おかげで\n 秘術を手に入れるこ:
With the aid of <pc> and Princess

177438.「許嫁どのが！？\n ああ……なんて無茶を なさるのです！:
The princess is here!? What a reckless thing

177439.「ヴィスタリア姫は 我々を 妨害しようとした\n 魔物によって ケガを……。\n:

177441.「……これまで 姫は カミルのことを\n お嫌いなのだとばかり 思っていたが\n:
I had always assumed the princess did not like

177443.「これで 不死の魔王も 倒せるはずです。\n アルヴァン。このことを やつらに\:
We now have an advantage over the Immortal Demon King. Let us make haste to his castle and put an end to this, before his agents hear
of our success here.

177444.「ああ……いよいよだな。\n 頼りにしているよ カミル！:
So the final battle is upon us at last! I am

177445.「僕は ヴィスタリア姫を 連れていく。\n <cs_pchero> カミル。\n:
I will take Princess Vistaria with me.
<cs_pchero>, Kamil. I will meet thee at

177446.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたが いなければ ジャミラスに\n:
<pc>. I owe our success to thee.

177447.「これからも どうか グランゼドーラのため……\n 世界を守るため ともに戦って:

177448.「では 私も グランゼドーラ城へ 戻ります。\n あなたも お気をつけて。:
I shall return to Gran Zedora. Please, get

177449.「<pc>さん。あなたを 待っていました。\n すこし 私の話に おつきあいくだ:
<pc>. I have been waiting for thee.
Please stay with me for a little while.

177450.「あの遺跡で手に入れた 巻物に\n こう 記してありました。: 'Tis about the contents of the scroll...

177451.「不死のチカラを 封じる 禁忌の秘術は\n 使う者の 生命と魂を けがす。:
The power of the scroll is great, yet it rots

177452.「魔王が持つ 不死のチカラは\n 神にも 等しきもの……ゆえに 対抗するには\n:
The Demon King's immortality is equal to that

177453.「……ヴィスタリア姫は 聡明な方ですね。\n あの方が ご危惧なされたとおり\n:
Princess Vistaria is wise for her age. As she

177454.「不死のチカラを封じなければ 魔王に勝てない。\n このままでは 世界は 滅びて:
So long as the Demon King's immortality remains, there shall be no hope of victory. His armies shall march across the world
'til naught remains but ash and ruin.

177455.「けれど……このことを アルヴァンが知れば\n きっと 秘術を使うことを 反対す:
Yet if Alvan knew the truth, he would not

177456.「心やさしい アルヴァンは 私に代わって\n 自分が秘術を使うとすら 言い出しか:
His is the kindest soul in all of Gran Zedora.
He would likely try to use the sealing arts in

177457.「勇者とは……魔王を倒すためだけに\n 必要なのでは ありません。:
A Hero's purpose is not only to defeat the

177458.「不死の魔王 ネロドスを 倒した後 \n この 傷ついた世界を導き 守るため……:
After the war is ended, there needs to be someone to lead and protect this wounded world... 'tis then that a Hero's power is
truly needed.

177459.「<pc>さん。\n あなたに お願いがあります。: <pc>. I have a favor to ask of thee.

177460.「秘術に 代償が必要であることも\n 私が すべてを捧げる覚悟だということも\n:
Do not speak of the sealing arts, nor of the
price that must be paid.<yesno><close>

177461.「お願いです <pc>さん！\n 秘術に 代償が必要だということは\n 私たちだ:
Please, <pc>! Please keep it between
us that there is a price to pay for the
sealing arts!<yesno><close>

177462.「ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n ……恩に着ます。:
I thank thee, <pc>. I shall never

177463.「私が 盟友に選ばれたのは\n 不死のチカラを 封じるためだったのでしょう。\n:
To seal the immortality of the Demon King and

177464.「盟友とは 勇者を守る盾。\n アルヴァンに救われた この生命。\n アルヴァン:
I am the shield that defends Alvan from harm.
Once, he saved my life. 'Twould be an honor to
give up my life so that he may live...

177465.「……これは 私の遺言です。\n <pc>さん。どうか 秘術のことは\n ご内密:
...'Tis my last will and testament,
<pc>. Please, I ask that thou
keepest the secret of the arts to thyself.

177466.「それと……ヴィスタリア姫の世話係 \n ヤスラムの正体が ジャミラスだったこと:
And please, do not speak of Yaslam being the
Demon General Jamirus.

177467.「城の者が 真相を知れば 不安がるでしょうし\n 姫の お立場も 悪くします。\:
If the people of the castle knew, 'twould harm our morale in this crucial moment. I also do not wish to cause trouble for
Princess Vistaria.

177468.「長々と お引き止めして 申し訳ありません。\n それでは <pc>さん。\n:
Alas, I have taken up more of thy time than I
intended. Farewell for now. I shall see thee
later in the throne room.

177470.「勇者と盟友 そして\n 頼もしき友人 <pc>の すべてが\n ここに そろい:
The Hero, the ally and our trusted companion
have been assembled!

177472.「では 盟友カミルよ。\n そなたの 報告を 聞こうではないか。: Then, ally Kamil. Let us hear your report.

177473.「……はっ。\n では 手短に ご報告いたします。: Right. I shall make this brief.

177474.「不死のチカラを封じる 禁忌の秘術を探し\n 国中を 探索した末\n とうとう:
After a long and arduous search, I have
discovered the ancient sealing arts.

177476.「いえ。これも <pc>さんと\n ヴィスタリア姫の 助けが あればこそ。\n:
No. 'Twas only with the help of Princess

able to succeed in my quest.

177477.「まあっ あの姫が……？\n にわかには 信じられませんが……。: Oh, the princess...? I can't believe it.

177478.「許嫁どのは 秘術を狙う魔物との戦いに\n 苦戦するカミルを 助けるため\n ひ:
She was badly injured whilst trying to help
Kamil, who was struggling to defeat the
beasts who had come for the scroll.

177479.「……姫を護衛していた 世話係のヤスラムは\n 魔物の手にかかり 息絶えた……と:
...Alas, her caretaker, Yaslam, died at the
hands of the monsters.

177480.「おお ヤスラムが……。おケガをなされた上\n 腹心の従者を 失ったとなれば\n:
...Poor Yaslam. I truly feel sorry for the
princess. To lose her retainer and to be
injured by monsters...

177481.「……うむ。いまだ おさなき姫と 思うていたが\n グランゼドーラのため 生命を:
Yes. I underestimated the extent to which
the Princess cared for the people of Gran
Zedora.

177482.「ヴィスタリア姫は 立派な 王妃となろう。\n ふたりが 結婚すれば 国は安泰じ:
She will make a fine queen. Once the war has
ended, those two shall guide our kingdom into
a new golden age!

177483.「勇者にふさわしき 勇気ある妃となりましょう。\n 魔王討伐が 成ったならば\n:
A brave queen, worthy of a Hero! Once the

177485.「この 不死のチカラを封じる秘術さえあれば\n 魔王ネロドスなど 恐るるに足りま:
So long as we hold the sealing arts, Demon
King Nerodos' defeat is inevitable.

177486.「魔王軍に 秘術の存在を 知られぬうちに\n ……明日の朝 夜明けとともに\n:
We should set out at dawn. 'Tis of the utmost
importance that we take advantage of the
sealing arts, before the Demon King finds out.

177487.「明日の朝だと！？\n そ それは なんとも急な話ですな。:
Tomorrow morning!? Is that not too soon? What

177488.「僕のケガも すっかり治りました。\n いつでも 魔王討伐に 出発できますよ。:
My injuries are completely healed. I can leave
anytime to defeat the Demon King.

177489.「うむ……。長きにわたる 魔王軍との戦いにも\n 勇者アルヴァンと 盟友カミルに:
At last, this long and bloody war shall end.
Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil shall lead us all
to victory!

177490.「アルヴァンさまと カミルどのならば\n 必ずや 魔王を倒してくださるはず！\n:
I have no doubt that Master Alvan and Kamil
will defeat the Demon King!

177492.「では 不死の魔王ネロドスとの\n 決戦の日どりは 明朝とする！\n アルヴァン:
The final battle approaches! Alvan and Kamil
shall ride at dawn, and defeat the Immortal
Demon King once and for all!

177493.「……そして <pc>よ。\n そなたには 勇者と盟友が 留守の間の\n グラン:
...and <pc>. I ask thee to protect
Gran Zedora while Alvan and Kamil
are away.

177494.「皆の者！ 宴だ！\n 勇者アルヴァンと 盟友カミルの\n 勝利を祈る宴を 開こ:
Everyone! Let us feast! Tonight we eat, drink
and sing in honor of our impending victory!

177497.不死の魔王ネロドスとの 戦いに おもむく\nアルヴァンと カミルのため\nグラン:
A grand banquet was held at Gran Zedora Castle
for Alvan and Kamil, who were on their way to
fight the Immortal Demon King Nerodos.

177498.長く 苦しかった 魔王軍との戦いに\nとうとう 終止符が打たれるかもしれない……:
The long and painful war against the Demon King's army might finally come to an end... and that hope brought smiles to the faces of
all the people in the country.

177500.「……<pc>。わたくし あなたに\n ちゃんと お礼を 言わなきゃと思って\n:
<pc>. I just wanted to offer thee
my thanks.

177501.「もしも あなたが いなければ\n ……わたくしは カミルを誤解したまま\n ヤ:
Were it not for thee, I would have been killed
by the impostor Yaslam, and I never would have
realized Kamil's true intentions.

177502.「<pc>は わたくしの恩人よ。\n あなたが いてくれて よかった……。:
Thou art my savior, <pc>. I owe
much to thee...

177503.「……今ね 国のお父様に 手紙を書いていたの。:
I just wrote a letter to my father, the king
of Farende.

177504.「わたくしは カミルに 生命を救われた。\n あの方は りっぱな盟友だから\n:
Kamil saved my life. After seeing her true
nature, I started to regret all the horrible
things I've said to her.

177506.「……あのね <pc>。\n わたくし 故郷のファルエンデ国に\n 好きな男の子:
...You know, <pc>. There was a boy
I liked back in my home country of Farende.

177507.「でも お父様の命令で アルヴァンさまのもとに\n 嫁ぐことになって……あの子に:
But my father had arranged for me to marry
Alvan, so I never got to tell that boy how
I truly felt about him...

177508.「この国へ来て すぐ……故郷からの便りで\n あの子は 魔王軍との戦いに 巻き込:
Soon after I arrived in Gran Zedora, I
received news that he had died in a battle
with the Demon King's army.

177509.「わたくしね……平和になったら\n ファルエンデ国に 戻ろうと思うの。:
I was thinking... that when peace is finally
restored to the land, I shall return to
Farende.

177510.「そして 兄様と あの子が眠る お墓の前で\n 勇者アルヴァンと 盟友カミルが:
Then, in front of the graves where he and my brother rest, I shall share with them the tale of Alvan and Kamil, the ones who restored
peace to the world.

177511.「……だから その前に アルヴァンさまと\n きちんと お話ししなくちゃね。\n:
But before all that, I must have a talk with
Alvan. I shall do it tomorrow, so as not to
interrupt his feast.

177512.「あら？ どうしたの <pc>。\n なにか 言いたそうな顔を してるけど。:
Oh? What's wrong, <pc>? Thou look
as though thou wishest to say something.

177513.<pc>は ヴィスタリア姫に\n不死の魔王との決戦が\n明日の朝に 決まったと:
<pc> explained to Princess
Vistaria that the battle with the Immortal
Demon King was set for tomorrow morning!

177514.「えっ！？ 魔王との決戦は カミルの進言で\n 明日の夜明けに？\n どうして:
What? Kamil's advised that the final battle
with the Demon King be held tomorrow at dawn?
Why so soon?

177515.「ごめんなさいね <pc>。\n わたくし 急ぎの用が あるの。\n 失礼いたし:
I'm sorry, <pc>. I have some
urgent business to attend to. Please excuse
me.

177516.「きゃーっ！ ヴィスタリア姫さま！？\n そんな お身体で どちらへ……: Kyah! Princess Vistaria! Where art thou going?

177517.「アルヴァンさまは 玉座の間ね！？: Is Alvan in the throne room!?

177518.「……僕との婚約を 破棄したいと\n そう おっしゃるのですね。ヴィスタリア姫。:
...So thou wishest to break off our
engagement. Princess Vistaria. Have I been
rude to thee?

177519.「いいえ。そもそも アルヴァンさまは\n カミルの命乞いのために いやいや\n:
Not at all, Alvan. It's just that our marriage was always simply a condition thou hath arranged with my father in exchange for
Kamil's pardon, yes?

177520.「そのようなことは 断じて……！\n 僕たちふたりが ふたつの国の\n 友好の:
O-of course not! I truly wish to forge deeper
bonds between our two kingdoms!

177521.「心配は ありませんわ。\n わたくしから お父様に カミルのことは\n もう許:
Worry not, dear Alvan. I shall personally ask
my father to forgive Kamil.

177522.「……お父様の命令で 婚約いたしましたが\n じつを言うと アルヴァンさまって\:
We only got engaged on my father's orders. To
be honest, my dear Alvan, thou art just not my
type.

177523.「それは アルヴァンさまも 同じでしょう？: And 'tis the same for thee, is it not?

177524.「僕は そもそも……そのっ！\n 不死の魔王を カミルとともに 倒すまでは\n:
Well... um. To be honest, I did not give much
thought to love. Not until Kamil and I defeat
the Demon King...

177525.「……やっぱり あなたたち 相思相愛ね。:
...I knew both of thee were meant for each
other.

177526.「許嫁どの……？\n いったい 何の話を なさっているのですか？:
Meant for each other...? Of what dost thou
speaketh?

177527.「とにかく！ わたくし もう 決めましたの。\n ケガが治り次第 国に帰ります。:
Either way, I have made up my mind. Once my
injuries heal, I shall return to Farende.
Perhaps we shall one day meet again.

177529.「わかりました。魔王討伐から 戻りましたら\n ファルエンデ国まで お送りしまし:
I understand. When the Demon King is
defeated, I shall return thee safely to
Farende.

177531.「ところで アルヴァンさま……。\n 魔王との決戦の日どりが 明朝というのは\n:
By the way, Alvan... is it true that the final
battle with the Demon King is scheduled for
tomorrow morning?

177532.「おや ご存知でしたか。秘術のことを\n 魔王軍に気取られぬうちに 出陣すべきと:
Oh, didst thou know? Kamil strongly insisted
that we go into battle before the Demon King's
army finds out about the secret arts.

177534.「アルヴァンさまっ！\n お願い！ カミルを止めて！！\n このままでは カミル:
Alvan, thou must stop Kamil! She will die if
thou doth not!

177536.「……秘術を守っていた ヨロイの幽霊さんが\n 言っていました。秘術には 代償が:
The guardian of the sealing arts spoke of a
price that any who use it must pay. That
price is Kamil's soul.

177537.「カミルは 不死の魔王 討伐のために…… \n いいえ アルヴァンさまのために\:
Kamil intends to sacrifice her life in order
to defeat the Demon King!

177539.「……だが それなら かたくなに\n 秘術探しに 僕を同行させなかったことも\n:
Though it would explain why Kamil so
insistently refused me when I offered to
assist with recovering the sealing arts.

177540.「……<pc>！\n 君は あの遺跡に カミルと一緒にいたね。\n 姫の話は 本:
...<pc>! Thou wert in those ruins
with Kamil. Does the princess speak true!?<yesno><close>

177541.「ウソをつくのは やめてくれっ！\n ……不死のチカラを封じる 秘術に 代償が\:
Don't lie to me! It makes sense. To seal
something like immortality must surely come at
a price.

177542.「やはり……そうなんだね。\n ……不死のチカラを封じる 秘術に 代償が\n 必:
As I thought... 'Tis true that the secret arts
of sealing the power of immortality requires
a price.

177543.「魔王ネロドス……\n その不死のチカラは おそるべきものだ。\n だが 魔王討:
Nerodos the Immortal Demon King... his
immortality is truly a thing to be feared. To
think such a sacrifice would be necessary...

177544.「カミルが……犠牲になるだなんて。\n そんなの 絶対に 認めないっ！:
...I cannot allow Kamil to sacrifice herself.
I will not allow it!

177545.「姫！ 秘術について もっと教えてください！\n なにか 他に 不死のチカラを:
Princess! Thou wert there with Kamil. Is there
any other way to seal the power of
immortality?

177546.「わ……わかりませんわ……。\n カミルが持っている 秘術の巻物になら\n もし:
I don't know... but Kamil has a scroll
that might have something on it...

177547.「……すまない 許嫁どの <pc>。\n 僕は これで失礼させてもらいます。\n:
I am sorry, Princess, <pc>. I must
leave now. Kamil and I must speak... alone.

177548.「……アルヴァンさま。\n どうか カミルを 助けてあげて。: Alvan... please, find a way to save Kamil.

177549.「……あら？ いやだわ。\n ちょっと ムリを しすぎたみたい……。\n <pc:
...Oh? Oh dear. I think I pushed myself a bit
too hard... <pc>. I'm going back to
my room.

177551.「……カミル。\n 不死の魔王との 決戦前に\n 君と ふたりだけで話がしたいん:
Kamil. The final battle will soon be upon us.
I would like to speak with thee before it
begins.

177552.「もう 夜も更けてきました。\n 明日にそなえて 休んだほうがいい。\n 話なら:
'Tis already late. Thou must get some rest
for tomorrow. We can speak in the morning
before we set out.

177554.「……今でなければ ダメなんだ。\n このとおりだ カミル。\n 一生の お願い:
...It has to be now, please! Just listen to
me, for I have a favor to ask.

177556.「わかりました。\n そこまで おっしゃるのでしたら。: ...I understand. Very well, we shall speak.

177558.「僕は カミルと 大事な話があるんだ。\n すまないが 宴は 僕たち抜きで やっ:
Kamil and I have something important to
discuss. Please, tell father to continue the
feast in our absence.

177559.「<pc>さん。\n 夜明けまでには 戻りますので ご心配なく。: Fear not, we shall be back by dawn.

177562.勇者アルヴァンと 盟友カミルは\n夜の空へ 去っていった……。:
Alvan and Kamil silently flew off into the
night sky...

177563.「……なんと。アルヴァンと カミルは\n ふたりで どこかへ 行ってしまったのか: What's that? Alvan and Kamil hath departed?

177564.「きっと つもる話も あるのですわ。\n いよいよ 魔王との決戦ですもの。:
'Tis likely they are preparing for the battle
to come. The final battle approaches.

177565.「……うむ。勇者と盟友の 間には\n 我らには はかりしれぬ絆が あるのだろう。:
The bond between Hero and ally is truly
inspiring, is it not?

177566.「そうそう <pc>よ。\n そなたには 約束していた ほうびを\n つかわさね:
Ah, <pc>. I must give thee the
reward I promised.

177567.「カミルが 禁忌の秘術を 手に入れ\n 無事 戻ったのも そなたの おかげじゃ。:
By assisting Kamil in obtaining the sealing
arts, thou hath played a great role in the
final battle against the Demon King.

177568.「これからも 我が息子アルヴァンと\n カミルを 支えてやってくれ。\n こたび:
Please continue to assist Alvan and Kamil.
Thou hath become a good friend of Gran Zedora
over these past few days.

177569.「しかし 主役ふたりが いないとなると……\n そろそろ 夜も 更けてまいった。:
Still, with the two guests of honor gone, I
think 'tis about time we end our revelry.

177570.「皆の者！ 宴は これにて 幕引きとする！\n 明日の 魔王との決戦に そなえ\:
Everyone! This concludes the feast! Rest well
in preparation for tomorrow's decisive battle
against the Demon King!

177571.華やかな宴が 終わると\n人々は それぞれ\n翌日の決戦にそなえ 帰っていった。:
After the festivities were over, the people
went home to prepare for the next day's
battle.

177572.<pc>も アルヴァンとカミルの帰りを\n遅くまで 待っていたが\nやがて 眠り:
<pc> also waited until late for Alvan
and Kamil to return, but eventually fell
asleep...

177575.「まったく。せめて この母に ひと目\n 顔を見せてから 出発すればよいものを。:
What was Alvan thinking? Not even bidding his
mother farewell before setting off to fight
the Demon King...

177581.「昨晩 魔王城へ ご出発なされたのは\n アルヴァン様 おひとりで ございます！:
Last night, 'twas only Master Alvan who left
for the Demon King's castle!

177606.「なんだ このネコは。\n どこから 入り込んだんだ？: What's with this cat? From whence did it come?

177608.「よっ。オレの舟 乗ってく？: Yo! Wanna go on a boat ride?

177609.「……もしかして オマエ。\n オレのこと ただの かっこいい おじさまって\n:
What, did you think I was another run of the
mill dashing gentleman?

177610.「見たら わかるでしょ！\n 樹天の里の 偉大なるキャプテン。\n オレ 世界的:
Well, you're in for a surprise! You stand in
the presence of the great captain of
Treetop Town!

177611.「グランゼドーラ城でも お姫さまから 黒猫まで\n オールラウンドにモテモテの:
From princesses to black cats, I'm known far and wide. From Gran Zedora castle to Farende and beyond. So just leave everything to me,
ooookay?

177612.「そう！ 朝帰りする オレの足に\n キュートな黒猫が ガブリと かみついたとき:
Yes! Early this morning as I was walking home, a black cat bit me on the leg. I followed it to this tower, and knew I
had to wait here.

177613.「あ それ♪\n キミには 行きたい場所がある～♪:
It's you I'm waiting for～♪ You have
somewhere you need to go～♪

177614.「ボクには 乗せたい舟がある～♪: I'll take you there on my magic boat～♪

177615.「そんな ふたりが 出会ったならば～♪\n 行くしか ないでしょ 魔王城！\n:
Fear not, my friend. Captain Stolke shall
safely deliver you to the Demon King's castle!

177616.「……おっと。驚かせちゃったかしら。\n ある時は 樹天の里の 偉大なるキャプテ:
Oops, hope I didn't startle you. I wear many faces. Sometimes, I am the great captain of Treetop Town. Other times, I am a charming
gentleman who dazzles all, even black cats.

177618.「伝説の四術師がひとり 破邪舟師 シュトルケ！:
I am one of the four sorcerers! Captain
Stolke, the Ship Shaper!

177619.「……というこっちゃ。魔王城で\n 勇者アルヴァンが 泣きべそかいて待ってるぞ！:
Right now, poor Alvan is all alone in the
Demon King's castle, probably crying his eyes
out. Go help him, quick!

177620.「目標 不死の魔王城！\n 破邪舟 キャプテン・シュトルケ号\n ヨーソロー！:
Setting sail for the Immortal Demon King's
castle! Steady as she goes!

177621.「魔軍十二将ごときでは\n もはや 貴様の 足止めにすらならぬか。\n 勇者アル:
Impressive. Not even the combined might of my
Tyrants could stop thee, Alvan.

177622.「……ああ。いい準備運動に なったよ。\n 心のこもった もてなしに 感謝する。:
'Twas a good warm up. I thank thee for thine
hospitality, Demon King Nerodos.

177623.「ほほう？ 赤子のように わめきたて\n 剣を振り回していた 小僧も\n ようや:
What's this? Could it be that the little boy
who would rant and rave like a child hath
finally learned some civility?

177624.「……はて。頼みの盟友は どうした？\n 貴様ひとりとは 軽んじられたものよ。:
'Tis a shame thy trusted ally has abandoned
thee. Fighting thee alone shall be too easy.

177625.「カミルが いなくたって\n 僕は お前を 倒してみせる！: Even without Kamil, I shall defeat thee!

177629.「……猶予をやろう。\n 盟友を ここへ 呼ぶがよい。\n そなたひとりでは 楽:
I shall grant thee this mercy, Hero! Leave
this place and return with thy ally. Thou
boreth me!

177631.「<cs_pchero>！？ どうして ここに……？\n それに 君の このチカ:
<cs_pchero>! How did thou get here? And
that power...

177632.「<cs_pchero>……と 申したか。\n 盟友と 同等のチカラを あやつる:
<pc>, you say? Interesting. Thou
too wieldeth the power of an ally... VERY
interesting.

177633.「勇者アルヴァン！ <cs_pchero>！\n 我は 不死の魔王！\n いまだ:
Hear me now! I am Nerodos, the Immortal Demon
Lord, and I hath never known defeat!

177634.「あがけ！ 苦しめ！\n 貴様らの その ただひとつの生命を捧げ\n 我が 無限:
Thou wilt suffer! Thou wilt die! Thy very
souls shall serve as fuel for the fires of my
immortality!

177635.「……行くよ <cs_pchero>！\n 不死の魔王を倒して グランゼドーラに:
Let's go, <pc>! The fate of Gran
Zedora and all of Astoltia rests in our hands!

177636.「はっはっは！\n これで 役者は そろったようだな。:
Ha-ha-ha! Now it looks like we have all the
players.

177637.「我は 不死の魔王！\n いまだ 死の敗北を 知らざる者！:
I am the Immortal Demon King! I hath never
known the defeat of death!

177638.「あがけ！ 苦しめ！\n 貴様らの その ただひとつの生命を捧げ\n 我が 無限:
Thou wilt suffer! Thou wilt die! Thy very
souls shall serve as fuel for the fires of my
immortality!

177639.「……行くよ <cs_pchero>！\n 不死の魔王を倒して グランゼドーラに:
Let's go, <pc>! The fate of Gran
Zedora and all of Astoltia rests in our hands!

177640.「……よろこぶがいい。\n かつて 我が 不死の糧となりし\n 幾千幾万の 勇敢:
...Rejoice. Until now, thousands upon
thousands of brave warriors fell before me,
serving to feed mine own immortality.

177642.「……この ネロドスに 勝利せしことを。:
For thou hast triumphed over Demon King
Nerodos.

177643.「おお！ 死とは なんと甘美なものよ！\n 我に 初の敗北を与えし 貴様らを\n:
Ahhh! The taste of death, how truly sweet it
is! I honor the both of thee for granting me
my first defeat.

177644.「……だが このネロドスは 不死なる魔王！: However...I am the Immortal Demon King!

177645.「我は滅びぬ！\n 幾度 倒されようとも 無限に よみがえる！:
I will not perish, no matter how many times
thou may strike me down!

177646.「ハーッハッハッハッハッ！！\n この戦いは 貴様らの勝利と 認めてやろう。:
Ha ha ha! The last battle may have been
a victory for thee.

177647.「だが……今一度 我に 勝てるかな！？\n 二度 勝てたとて 三度 四度……\n:
...Yet will thee be able to strike me down a second time? Or a third? Fourth? No matter how many times thou might kill me, I shall
keep coming back!

177649.「不死の魔王ネロドス！\n 今日こそ お前は 滅びるんだっ！:
Nerodos! Today thou shalt die thy final
death!

177650.「禁忌の秘術よ！ 僕の魂を 使うがいい！\n ……いでよ 邪魂の鎖！:
Sealing arts! From my soul, forge a binding
chain!

177651.「なんだ それは……？\n ふっ。小手先の技が 我に 通用するとでも？:
What's this now? Dost thou truly think thy
cheap tricks will work on me?

177652.「そうとも……！\n 邪魂の鎖が お前の不死のチカラを 封印する！:
Yes! Today I shall take from thee thy
greatest advantage!

177654.「グオオオオオオッ！？\n さ 再生が…止まる……。\n 我が不死が……封じられ:
Guoooooghh! My regeneration... has stopped...
My immortality... has been sealed!?

177656.<center>わ…我は……\n……不死なる……魔王……。: I am... the Immortal... Demon King...

177657.<center>……不死なる この身が\n滅び……死するなど\n断じて……認め…:
I will never... allow my immortal body to
perish... and die... ever...

177658.「あとは……っ\n 魔王から 切り離した 不死を……\n もうひとつの秘術……聖:
All that remains...is to sever the core of his
immortality...using the second secret art...
The Holy Sword....!

177661.「魔王ネロドスが 宿せし\n 不死のチカラ……もらいうける。:
The Demon King's immortality... I'll be taking
